This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

3h 45m Beginner Jun 30, 2015 Updated Jan 04, 2016   | Uploaded in Jan 12, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject:  Marketing 
Software:  Google Analytics 
Author:  Brad Batesole 
 
Do you want to know more about your visitors and how your content is performing? Whether you run a website for a home business or a large corporation, Google Analytics is the industry standard for tracking, analyzing, and reporting site data. Knowing how to use Google Analytics correctly will help you measure site traffic, SEO, engagement, ad revenue, and even activity on social media. This course shows you how to get set up in Google Analytics and glean insights from each of the reports. Author Brad Batesole explains how to interpret your results, create and track goals, and use options like dimensions and segments to go deeper. Each tutorial is practical and succinct, touching on the features you'll use most in your day-to-day analytics workflow.
Topics include:

	â€¢	Installing tracking tags

	â€¢	Setting up report filters
	â€¢	Looking at audience demographics and interests
	â€¢	Tracking engagement with behavior reports
	â€¢	Exploring traffic with acquisition reports
	â€¢	Viewing shared content and referrals with social reports
	â€¢	Reviewing SEO feedback
	â€¢	Tracking events
	â€¢	Configuring conversion goals
	â€¢	Adding custom campaign tracking
